description: This API creates a link to download a specific tax document (e.g., sales invoice). Response returned to the seller's account, available only after the document is issued by the system at part of the fulfillment by Shopee process.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon partner registration is successful. Required for all requests

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Example: 1615550000

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the app. Valid for multiple calls and expires at launch

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for shop api

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id (if partner_key in api is SHOP_BY_PARTNER)

parameters.name: document_type
parameters.description: 1 = Remessa, 2 = Return, 3 = Remessa + Return, 4 = Sale, 5 = Service, 6 = Sale + Remessa, 7 = all

parameters.name: document_status
parameters.description: 1 = authorized only, 2 = cancelled, Default: if document_status not pass or is invalid empty, means download under ALL document_status (authorized and cancelled)

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if no error displays 0 if no error happened

response_fields.name: result_id
response_fields.description: Unique task identifier that includes one or more tax documents to be downloaded according to the filters sent in the request

response_fields.name: fbt_error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if one element hit error Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: fbt_message
response_fields.description: Indicate error detail if one element hit error Empty if no error happened

notes: This appears to be a tax document generation API for Shopee's fulfillment by Shopee process. The API includes various endpoints for different locales (Chinese Mainland, Brazil) and test environments.
